name: scripts
description: This repository contains a collection of Node.js scripts designed to automate common development tasks. These scripts simplify project setup, configuration, and other repetitive tasks, allowing you to focus on coding.

scripts.build-express: npm run create-test-dir && cd test && node ../initializers/express-ts/build-express-ts.mjs
scripts.build-express-22: npm run create-test-dir && cd test && node ../initializers/express-ts/build-express-ts-node-22.mjs
